helpText: ґ_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________Ї.

generic.title: ґ_Error updating categories__________________________Ї
generic.message: ґ_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________Ї.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ґ_Error updating categories__________________________Ї
maxDepthExceeded.message: ґ_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________Ї.

destinationHasSameName.title: ґ_Error updating categories__________________________Ї
destinationHasSameName.message: ґ_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________Ї.

noSchema.title: ґ_Schema not found_________________Ї
noSchema.message: ґ_Item schema not found for user_________________Ї.

maxCharacter.title: ґ_Error updating categories__________________________Ї
maxCharacter.message: ґ_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________Ї.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ґ_Delete category________________Ї
deleteInUseCategory.message: ґ_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________Ї.

custom.title: ґ_Custom categories__________________Ї
custom.message: ґ_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________Ї.

arcgis.title: ґ_ArcGIS categories__________________Ї
arcgis.message: ґ_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________Ї.

iso.title: ґ_ISO categories_______________Ї
iso.message: ґ_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________Ї.

inspire.title: ґ_INSPIRE categories___________________Ї
inspire.message: ґ_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________Ї.
